name: Strug Lives
description:
Game Description:

Strug Live is a side scroll game that has to avoid several obstacles including roadblocks and roadboxes, because if the player hits the obstacle, the player's points will be reduced and game over occurs. Players will get points if they crash into money prefebs.

This game has several levels including, easy, medium, hard. If played, the player can choose to play at which level. Because each level will be more difficult.

I as the creator of the Strug Lives game hope this game can be useful and can be used well.

OKE, Have fun using the game and playing the game!!!!

Game Controls:

[ Space = Jump ]
